title: Pediatric Asthma Self-Management Education: Blended Learning Based on Therapeutic Education (TE)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners participate in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, with an emphasis on practical activities applying real clinical cases.

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three pediatric asthma symptoms and triggers.
Establish case-specific management strategies by applying asthma control-level action plans (e.g., green/yellow/red zones).
Practice medication adherence tracking and symptom monitoring methods using a smartphone app at least three times.
Evaluate parent-child communication skills through role-playing and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
